Action: 1-Signup page is already opened
Register using valid admin credentials
Click on Admin radio button
Expected Result: The Admin button is selected

Action: Enter a valid admin username
Expected Result: The place holder is removed and username is entered succesfully

Action: Enter a valid email
Expected Result: The place holder is removed and email is entered succesfully

Action: Enter a valid password
Expected Result:
-The place holder is removed and password is entered succesfully
-The password id encripted(****) or (......)

Action: Click on Sign-up button
Expected Result:
-Sign-up is succesfull
-User is redirected to the main page
-A verification email is sent to the user

Click on Admin radio button
Expected Result: The Project Owner button is selected

Action: Enter a valid Project Owner username
Expected Result: The place holder is removed and username is entered succesfully

Action: Enter a valid Project Owner email
Expected Result: The place holder is removed and email is entered succesfully

Action: Enter a valid Project Owner password
Expected Result:
-The place holder is removed and password is entered succesfully
-The password id encripted(****) or (......)

Action: Click on Sign-up button
Expected Result:
-Sign-up is succesfull

-A verification email is sent to the user

Action: Register using valid Facebook user (who has an email)
Click on Facebook icon
Expected Result: User is redirectet to Facebook to register using it

Action: Login to Facebook( when redirected to it)
Expected Result:
-User is return to the application
-Sign-up is succesfull
-User is redirected to the home page

Action: Register using valid Facebook user (who registred to Facebook using a phone number)
Click on Facebook icon
Expected Result: User is redirectet to Facebook to register using it

Action: Login to Facebook( when redirected to it)
Expected Result:
-User is returned to the application
-User is asked to add an email address

Action: Enter a valid email
Expected Result: The place holder is removed and email is entered succesfully

Action: Enter a valid password
Expected Result:
-The place holder is removed and password is entered succesfully
-The password id encripted(****) or (......)

Action: Click on sigh-up button
Expected Result:
-Sign-up is succesfull
-User is redirected to the main page
-A verification email is sent to the user

Action: Register using valid Google account
Click on Google icon
Expected Result: User is redirectet to Google account page

Action: Choose an account
Expected Result:
-User is returned to the application
-Registration is done succesfully
-User is redirected to home page

Action: Sign-up without choosing type of user
Do not choose any user
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click on sign-up button
Expected Result: The error message appears telling that user must choose the type of user

Action: Sign-up with invalid user name
Fill the username field with invalid user name(one character-A)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click on sign-up button
Expected Result:
The error massege appears telling the user to fill the username 
with valid name at least two characters

Action: Sign-up with already used username
Fill the usename with already used username
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click on sign-up button
Expected Result:
The error massege appears telling the user that the username
 already taken

Action: Sigh-up with a very long username
Fill the username field with a very long name(100)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click on sign-up button
Expected Result:
The error massege appears telling the user that the username
 must not exceed 50 characters

Action: Sign-up with username field empty
Leave the username field empty
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result:
The error massege appears telling the user to fill the username 
field

Action: Sign-up with username in different language
Fill the username field in Russian or Arabic
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The registration complete

Action: Sign-up without email address
Leave the email field empty
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The error massege appears telling the user to fill the email field

Action: Sign-up with already used email
Fill the email with already used email address
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click on sign-up button
Expected Result:
-The error massege appears telling the user that the email address
 already used
-The message appears encouraging the user to login with existed email

Action: Sign-up with wrong email format
Fill email address field with wrong email format(dghjsb25.com)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The error message appears telling that email field must be correct format(shd@dgg.com)

Action: Sign-up with email already used but not verified
Enter an already registred but not verified email in the email field
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result:
-The message appears telling the user that entered email already used and needs verification
-An option appears to send a verification email again

Action: Sign-up with an email that is attached with already register Facebook user
Enter an valid email that is attached with already register facebook user
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: A message appears telling the user that this email is attached to the facebook account and encourage the user to login using Facebook

Action: Sign-up with empty password field
Leave the passwor field empty
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result:
The error massege appears telling the user to fill the password
 field

Action: Sign-up with short password
Fill the pssword field with a short password(Qdf3&)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The error message appears telling to insert the password with a minimum of 6 characters

Action: Sign-up with password that does not contain a special characters
Fill the pssword field with a password that does not contain special characters(Qsdf45)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The error message appears telling to insert the password which contains special characters

Action: Sign-up with password that does not contain a small letters
Fill the pssword field with a password that does not contain small letters(ASD45Â£)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The error message appears telling to insert the password which contains small letters

Action: Sign-up with password that does not begin with capital letter
Fill the pssword field with a password that does not begin with capital letter(asd45$)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The error message appears telling to insert the password which begins with capital letter

Action: Sign-up with password that does not contain a number
Fill the pssword field with a password that does not contain a number(Asdf$c)
Fill the other fields with valid data
Click the sign-up button
Expected Result: The error message appears telling to insert the password which contains a number
